PageSection.title: India's Biggest Inflatable Adventure Park!
PageSection.subtitle: Experience the thrill of jumping, sliding, and bouncing in a safe and fun environment.
PageSection.content: Experience the thrill of jumping, sliding, and bouncing in a safe and fun environment.

PageSection.title: Our Story
PageSection.content:
Ninja Inflatable Park was born from a simple idea: create a space where people of all ages can unleash their inner ninja, challenge themselves, and have an absolute blast doing it.

Spanning over 20,000 square feet, we've created India's largest inflatable adventure park with 11+ unique zones designed to thrill, challenge, and entertain.

Whether you're looking for a fun family outing, an adrenaline-pumping workout, or the perfect venue for your next celebration, Ninja Park is your destination for unforgettable memories.

PageSection.title: Parties Terms & Conditions
PageSection.content:
• Minimum of 10 participants required for all party packages.
  • A non-refundable deposit is required to secure your booking.
  • Party duration includes jump time and party room access.
  • Outside food and drinks are not permitted (except for birthday cakes).
  • Waivers must be signed for all participants.
  • Socks are required for all jumpers.

• Arrive Early: 15 mins before session

Faq.question: What age groups can enjoy Ninja Park?
Faq.answer: We have zones for everyone! From a dedicated toddler area to challenging courses for teens and adults. It's truly All Ages, All Fun.

Faq.question: Do I need to book in advance?
Faq.answer: We highly recommend booking online to secure your slot, especially on weekends. Walk-ins are subject to availability.

Faq.question: What should I wear?
Faq.answer: Comfortable athletic wear is best. Socks are MANDATORY for hygiene and safety. We sell grip socks at the counter if you need them.

Faq.question: Is the park safe for children?
Faq.answer: Absolutely! We have a 100% safety record. Our equipment is top-tier, and trained marshals supervise all zones.

Faq.question: Can I host a birthday party here?
Faq.answer: Yes! We specialize in unforgettable birthday bashes. Check out our Parties page for packages.

LegalDocument.title: Terms & Conditions
LegalDocument.intro: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using Ninja Inflatable Park.

sections.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.content: By entering Ninja Inflatable Park, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use our facilities.

sections.title: Age Requirements
sections.content: Participants must be at least 1 year old. Children under 12 must be accompanied by an adult (18+) who remains on the premises. Separate zones are designated for different age groups to ensure safety.

sections.title: Health & Safety
sections.content: Participants must be in good health and free from any medical conditions that could be aggravated by physical activity. Pregnant women, individuals with heart conditions, back problems, or recent injuries should not participate. If you have any medical concerns, please consult your doctor before visiting.

sections.title: Rules & Regulations
sections.content: All participants must follow park rules and staff instructions at all times. Failure to comply may result in immediate removal from the park without refund. Grip socks are mandatory for all participants and can be purchased at the facility.

sections.title: Liability
sections.content: Ninja Inflatable Park takes every precaution to ensure safety, but participation in activities is at your own risk. By entering the park, you acknowledge that inflatable activities carry inherent risks and agree to waive any claims against the park for injuries sustained during normal use.

sections.title: Booking & Payments
sections.content: All bookings must be paid in advance. Cancellations made 24 hours before the session are eligible for a full refund. Late cancellations or no-shows are non-refundable. We reserve the right to cancel sessions due to maintenance or safety concerns with full refunds provided.

sections.title: Photography & Media
sections.content: By entering the park, you consent to being photographed or recorded for promotional purposes. If you do not wish to be included in promotional materials, please inform staff upon entry.

sections.title: Personal Belongings
sections.content: Ninja Inflatable Park is not responsible for lost, stolen, or damaged personal belongings. Lockers are available for rent. We recommend leaving valuables at home.

sections.title: Right to Refuse Entry
sections.content: We reserve the right to refuse entry or remove any person from the premises who appears intoxicated, under the influence of drugs, or behaves in a manner deemed unsafe or inappropriate.

sections.title: Changes to Terms
sections.content: These terms and conditions may be updated from time to time. Continued use of our facilities constitutes acceptance of any changes.

LegalDocument.title: Participant Waiver & Release of Liability
LegalDocument.intro: This waiver must be signed by all participants (or their legal guardian if under 18) before entry.

sections.title: Assumption of Risk
sections.content: I acknowledge that participation in inflatable park activities involves inherent risks including but not limited to: falls, collisions, sprains, fractures, and other injuries. I voluntarily assume all risks associated with participation.

sections.title: Health Declaration
sections.content: I certify that I (or the minor participant) am in good physical condition and have no medical conditions that would prevent safe participation. I agree to immediately inform staff of any health issues that arise during my visit.

sections.title: Release of Liability
sections.content: I hereby release, waive, discharge, and covenant not to sue Ninja Inflatable Park, its owners, employees, and agents from any and all liability, claims, demands, or causes of action arising from participation in park activities, including those caused by negligence.

sections.title: Medical Treatment Authorization
sections.content: In the event of injury, I authorize Ninja Inflatable Park staff to provide first aid and, if necessary, arrange for emergency medical treatment. I agree to be responsible for any medical expenses incurred.

sections.title: Rules Compliance
sections.content: I agree to follow all posted rules, safety guidelines, and instructions from park staff. I understand that failure to comply may result in immediate removal from the facility without refund.

sections.title: Parental Consent (For Minors)
sections.content: As the parent or legal guardian, I consent to the minor's participation and agree to all terms on their behalf. I understand that I am responsible for supervising the minor and ensuring their compliance with all rules.

sections.title: Photo/Video Consent
sections.content: I grant permission for Ninja Inflatable Park to use photographs or videos taken during my visit for promotional purposes without compensation.

sections.title: Acknowledgment
sections.content: I have read this waiver carefully, understand its contents, and sign it voluntarily. I acknowledge that this is a legal document that affects my legal rights.

LegalDocument.title: Privacy Policy
LegalDocument.intro: Ninja Inflatable Park is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information.

sections.title: Information We Collect
sections.content: We collect personal information including name, email, phone number, date of birth, and emergency contact details when you book sessions or sign waivers. We also collect payment information for transactions and may use cookies on our website to improve user experience.

sections.title: How We Use Your Information
sections.content: Your information is used to: process bookings and payments, communicate about your reservations, send promotional offers (with your consent), maintain safety records and waivers, improve our services, and comply with legal obligations.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information. Payment data is processed through secure, PCI-compliant payment gateways. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

sections.title: Information Sharing
sections.content: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share information with: payment processors for transactions, emergency services if required for safety, legal authorities when required by law, and service providers who assist in our operations (under strict confidentiality agreements).

sections.title: Data Retention
sections.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, comply with legal obligations, and resolve disputes. Waiver forms are kept for 7 years as required by law.

sections.title: Your Rights
sections.content: You have the right to: access your personal data, request corrections to inaccurate information, request deletion of your data (subject to legal requirements), opt-out of marketing communications, and withdraw consent for data processing.

sections.title: Cookies & Tracking
sections.content: Our website uses cookies to enhance user experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can control cookie preferences through your browser settings.

sections.title: Children's Privacy
sections.content: We collect minimal information from children under 13, only as necessary for safety and booking purposes, always with parental consent. Parents have the right to review and request deletion of their child's information.

sections.title: Changes to Privacy Policy
sections.content: We may update this privacy policy periodically. Significant changes will be communicated via email or website notice. Continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

sections.title: Contact Us
sections.content: For privacy-related questions or to exercise your rights, contact us at: Email: privacy@ninjapark.com, Phone: +91 98454 71611, Address: Gopalan Innovation Mall, Bangalore.

LegalDocument.title: Waiver Terms & Conditions
LegalDocument.intro: Additional terms specific to the waiver agreement.

sections.title: Waiver Validity
sections.content: This waiver is valid for one calendar year from the date of signing. Participants must sign a new waiver annually or if there are significant changes to health status.

sections.title: Electronic Signatures
sections.content: Electronic signatures are legally binding and have the same effect as handwritten signatures. By signing electronically, you confirm your identity and intent to be bound by this agreement.

sections.title: Waiver Requirements
sections.content: All participants must have a signed waiver on file before entry. No exceptions will be made. Waivers can be completed online in advance or at the facility before your session.

sections.title: Guardian Responsibility
sections.content: Parents or legal guardians must sign waivers for all participants under 18 years of age. The guardian signing the waiver must be present during the minor's visit.

sections.title: Waiver Storage
sections.content: Signed waivers are stored securely in our system for 7 years as required by law. You may request a copy of your signed waiver at any time.

LegalDocument.title: Detailed Park Rules
LegalDocument.intro: Comprehensive rules and regulations for all participants.

sections.title: Entry Requirements
sections.content: Valid booking confirmation required. Grip socks mandatory (available for purchase). Waiver must be signed before entry. Arrive 15 minutes before session start time. Late arrivals may result in reduced session time.

sections.title: Dress Code
sections.content: Wear comfortable athletic clothing. Remove all jewelry, watches, glasses, and sharp objects. Tie long hair back. No shoes allowed in play areas (grip socks only). No loose clothing that could catch on equipment.

sections.title: Prohibited Items
sections.content: Food and drinks (except water in sealed bottles). Chewing gum. Electronic devices in play areas. Sharp objects of any kind. Bags or backpacks (use lockers). Outside equipment or toys.

sections.title: Behavior Rules
sections.content: Follow all staff instructions immediately. No pushing, shoving, or rough play. One person on slides at a time. No running in non-play areas. No climbing on safety barriers. Respect other participants. No inappropriate language or behavior.

sections.title: Safety Zones
sections.content: Toddler Zone (1-7 years): Dedicated area for young children. Main Zones (8+ years): Age-appropriate challenges. Respect zone boundaries. Do not enter zones not suitable for your age/size.

sections.title: Supervision Requirements
sections.content: Children under 12 must have adult supervision. Supervising adults must remain on premises. One adult can supervise maximum 4 children. Adults must be able to respond quickly in emergencies.

sections.title: Health & Hygiene
sections.content: Wash hands before entering play areas. Use hand sanitizer stations provided. Cover coughs and sneezes. Do not participate if feeling unwell. Inform staff immediately of any accidents or spills.

sections.title: Emergency Procedures
sections.content: In case of emergency, follow staff instructions. Know the location of emergency exits. First aid available on-site. Emergency contact numbers posted throughout facility. Do not leave premises without informing staff in emergencies.

sections.title: Capacity Limits
sections.content: Maximum capacity enforced for safety. Wait your turn if an area is full. Time limits may be imposed during busy periods. Staff have final say on capacity decisions.

sections.title: Consequences of Rule Violations
sections.content: First violation: Verbal warning. Second violation: Temporary removal from activity. Third violation: Removal from park without refund. Serious violations: Immediate removal and potential ban. No refunds for rule violations.

GuidelineCategory.title: Before You Jump
items: Remove all sharp objects (jewelry, watches, keys, etc.)
Grip socks are MANDATORY - available for purchase

GuidelineCategory.title: General Safety
items: Follow all instructions from Court Marshals
One person per trampoline at a time
No double bouncing or rough play
Always land on two feet or your back

GuidelineCategory.title: While Playing
items: One person on slides at a time
No pushing, shoving, or rough play

GuidelineCategory.title: Dress Code
items: Remove all jewelry and loose objects
No belt buckles or clothing studs
Long hair must be tied back

GuidelineCategory.title: Health Restrictions
items: Do not jump with health limitations
Do not jump under influence of alcohol/drugs
Waiver must be signed by all jumpers

GuidelineCategory.title: Health & Safety
items: Inform staff of any medical conditions
No food or drinks in play areas

GuidelineCategory.title: Age Restrictions
items: Adult supervision required for children under 12
Height/weight restrictions apply to certain attractions
Separate sessions for different age groups

GuidelineCategory.title: Kids Zone Rules
items: Adult supervision required at all times
No big kids allowed in this zone

GuidelineCategory.title: Spectator Policy
items: Spectators must stay in designated areas
Do not enter the inflatable arenas
No food or drink on the course

GuidelineCategory.title: Equipment Safety
items: No keys, phones, or sharp objects
Do not chew gum or eat while jumping
